nodes.text: Narglatch AirTech was a small, independent development firm in operation during the last decades of the Galactic Republic.

Narglatch manufactured airspeeders and speeder custom kits for wealthy hobbyists across the galaxy. Their products attracted the attention of many influential Senators and Core Worlders in the Republic, including the playboy senator of Vorzyd V, Simon Greyshade. Narglatch AirTech produced the XJ-6 airspeeder purchased by Greyshade and the XJ-2 model flown by Senator Bail Organa on Alderaan and Coruscant.
